column5: Well said from all of you. Hope your Christmas was filled with hope and happiness. From the UP of MI
Merry Christmas to all and to all a good bite
Its Merry Christmas - X means taking Christ out of Christmas! Merry Christmas All

A mop! What a wonderful last minute gift which the little lady will find so attractive! Had my eye set on a high tech vacuum cleaner, but this seems so much more personal, and has heirloom hand-me-down potential as well.. What a surprise will be in store. Many thanks, eyecatcher!! Bill
Merry Christmas to all! Here's to hoping for the gift of common sense in everyone's stockings tomorrow!
Just saving relationships one post on walleye central at a time. Not a hero, just doing what I can.
Merry Christmas and Happy New Years to everyone. May 2021 be bring happiness and good luck to all.
Merry Christmas to all!!
Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays everyone Cheers Andrew
Merry Christmas to all! Have a happy and HEALTHY New Year!
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to all from Alberta. WE hope to see y'all up here next summer after all this snow melts (hopefully).
Merry Christmas to all y'all and may we be fishing in Canada in 2021.

As awful as 2020 has been for a lot of people on both sides of the border, there is more to life than a Canadian fishing trip. I missed mine for the first time in 30 years, but I will survive. Enjoy this time now with your families (not sure if Canadians can or not) and remember what this season is all about. Lets hope and pray that a year from now we will be back to normal and this will all be a bad dream. Merry Christmas All! I hope you have some new fishing stuff under the tree!

Merry Christmas, and as bad as it's been there will be some positives that come out of it....some of them we may not realize at this time. Let's hope some Canadian fishing is part of everyone's life going forward..... Stay healthy...
Yes,merry Christmas to all,all but Trudeau
I agree. I hope whoever wants to go to Canada fishing next year is able to and this awful virus is gone. Merry Christmas and think positive.
Ditto
Merry Xmas to all.

Merry Christmas, and happy holidays to all. I hope that everyone finds a little peace and good cheer, and that there’s something to unwrap that brings you joy! Last minute advice fellas, get that special lady in your life something that she will cherish this Christmas. You’re welcome.
Merry Christmas to all!!! Later, Jay
Merry Christmas everyone and may you all have a great 2021!
Merry Christmas from the frozen tundra of Minnesota. May 2021 bring good health, prosperity & unity to all.
